cards.name: The Fool
cards.symbolism: A young person stands at the edge of a cliff, carrying a small bundle, accompanied by a small dog, the sun shining bright behind them
cards.meaning_upright: New beginnings, optimism, trust in life, innocence, free spirit, spontaneity
cards.meaning_reversed: Recklessness, taken advantage of, inconsideration, naivety, foolishness
cards.prompt_template: A carefree traveler at the edge of a cliff with a small companion, sun shining bright, representing new beginnings and innocent optimism in the style of {token}

cards.name: The Magician
cards.symbolism: A figure stands before a table with the four suit symbols (wand, cup, sword, pentacle), one hand pointing to the sky, one to the earth, infinity symbol above their head
cards.meaning_upright: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, inspired action, skill, ability
cards.meaning_reversed: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents, illusion, trickery
cards.prompt_template: A powerful figure at a table displaying magical tools and symbols of the four elements, channeling energy between heaven and earth in the style of {token}

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.symbolism: A seated figure between two pillars, holding a scroll, crescent moon at their feet, veil behind revealing water
cards.meaning_upright: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, the subconscious mind, inner voice
cards.meaning_reversed: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal, silence, repressed feelings
cards.prompt_template: A mysterious figure seated between pillars with sacred scrolls and lunar imagery, guardian of hidden knowledge in the style of {token}

cards.name: The Empress
cards.symbolism: A crowned figure seated in lush nature, pregnant with creation, surrounded by ripe harvest and flowing water
cards.meaning_upright: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, abundance, fertility, creativity
cards.meaning_reversed: Creative block, dependence on others, smothering, lack of growth
cards.prompt_template: A regal nurturing figure surrounded by abundant nature, ripe harvests, and flowing creativity in the style of {token}

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.symbolism: A bearded figure on a stone throne decorated with ram heads, holding an ankh and orb, mountains behind
cards.meaning_upright: Authority, establishment, structure, father figure, leadership, stability
cards.meaning_reversed: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline, inflexibility, tyranny
cards.prompt_template: A commanding authoritative figure on a throne of stone with symbols of power and structured leadership in the style of {token}

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.symbolism: A religious figure seated between two pillars, giving blessing, two followers kneel before them, keys at their feet
cards.meaning_upright: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions, education
cards.meaning_reversed: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging tradition, unconventional, rebellion
cards.prompt_template: A wise spiritual teacher between pillars sharing sacred traditions with devoted followers in the style of {token}

cards.name: The Lovers

cards.meaning_reversed: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values, conflict

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.symbolism: An armored figure in a chariot pulled by two sphinxes (one black, one white), stars crown above, city behind
cards.meaning_upright: Control, willpower, success, action, determination, victory, direction
cards.meaning_reversed: Self-discipline, opposition, lack of direction, scattered energy, defeat

cards.meaning_reversed: Inner strength, self-doubt, low energy, raw emotion, insecurity

cards.meaning_reversed: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal, paranoia, losing your way

cards.prompt_template: A generous figure sharing wealth with balanced scales showing giving and receiving in the style of {token}

cards.name: Seven of Pentacles
cards.symbolism: A figure leans on tool looking at pentacles growing on bush, contemplating work and harvest to come
cards.meaning_upright: Long-term view, sustainable results, perseverance, investment, patience, harvest
cards.meaning_reversed: Lack of long-term vision, limited success, anxiety, impatience, short-term focus
cards.prompt_template: A gardener contemplating growing pentacles representing patience and long-term investment in the style of {token}

cards.name: Eight of Pentacles
cards.symbolism: A craftsperson carves pentacles with focus and dedication, completed work displayed, representing mastery through practice
cards.meaning_upright: Apprenticeship, repetitive tasks, mastery, skill development, dedication, craftsmanship
cards.meaning_reversed: Self-development, perfectionism, misdirected activity, lack of quality, shortcuts
cards.prompt_template: A dedicated artisan perfecting their craft through focused repetition and skill in the style of {token}

cards.name: Nine of Pentacles
cards.symbolism: A wealthy figure in fine robes stands in abundant garden with falcon, representing self-made success
cards.meaning_upright: Abundance, luxury, self-sufficiency, financial independence, success, refinement
cards.meaning_reversed: Self-worth, over-investment in work, hustling, living beyond means, financial setback
cards.prompt_template: An elegant figure in abundant garden representing self-made wealth and refined independence in the style of {token}

cards.name: Ten of Pentacles
cards.symbolism: Multi-generational family in courtyard with dogs, pentacles form Tree of Life pattern, representing inherited wealth
cards.meaning_upright: Wealth, financial security, family, long-term success, contribution, legacy, dynasty
cards.meaning_reversed: Financial failure, loneliness, loss, short-term mindset, family disputes, inheritance
cards.prompt_template: Multiple generations gathered in prosperity representing family wealth and lasting legacy in the style of {token}

cards.name: Page of Pentacles
cards.symbolism: A young figure holds pentacle aloft studying it, green field and mountains behind, representing grounded ambition
cards.meaning_upright: Manifestation, financial opportunity, skill development, new ideas, studiousness
cards.meaning_reversed: Lack of progress, procrastination, learn from failure, poor planning, lack of focus
cards.prompt_template: A studious messenger examining a pentacle with grounded curiosity and practical ambition in the style of {token}

cards.name: Knight of Pentacles
cards.symbolism: An armored figure on sturdy still horse holds pentacle carefully, plowed field behind, representing methodical progress
cards.meaning_upright: Hard work, productivity, routine, conservatism, responsibility, methodical, reliable
cards.meaning_reversed: Self-discipline, boredom, feeling 'stuck', perfectionism, work-life imbalance
cards.prompt_template: A steadfast knight with pentacle showing patient dedication and reliable progress in the style of {token}

cards.name: Queen of Pentacles
cards.symbolism: A crowned figure on throne in lush garden gazes at pentacle, rabbit at feet, representing abundant nurturance
cards.meaning_upright: Nurturing, practical, providing financially, a working parent, grounded, abundant
cards.meaning_reversed: Financial independence, self-care, work-home conflict, smothering, jealousy
cards.prompt_template: A nurturing sovereign in abundant garden balancing material provision with care in the style of {token}

cards.name: King of Pentacles
cards.symbolism: A crowned figure on throne decorated with bull heads and grapes, holds pentacle, castle and abundant garden behind
cards.meaning_upright: Wealth, business, leadership, security, discipline, abundance, provider, stable
cards.meaning_reversed: Financially inept, obsessed with wealth, stubborn, greed, materialistic, corruption
cards.prompt_template: A prosperous ruler on throne of abundance representing mastery of material realm and stable leadership in the style of {token}
